name: easy-appointments
description: Easy!Appointments is an online appointment scheduling system that lets customers book services with staff. It supports calendars, email notifications, working hours, and is popular with small businesses running self-hosted booking pages.
features: Online Booking: Customers schedule appointments 24/7. No phone calls needed.
Calendar Management: View and manage staff schedules easily. Organized appointment tracking.
Email Notifications: Automatic reminders for customers and staff. Reduce no-shows significantly.
Working Hours: Configure availability and business hours. Flexible scheduling control.
Small Business Ready: Perfect for salons, clinics, and consultants. Professional booking solution.
Self-Hosted: Run your booking system privately. Complete control over customer data.
